underlying_goal: Write a YouTube video script (Episode 1 of 4) for the 'AI가 내 두 번째 뇌를 읽다' series by running 4 WOW queries against the vault-intelligence CLI and incorporating real search results into the script
brief_summary: User (via team lead) requested a YouTube script based on real CLI search results from a vault-intelligence tool; Claude executed all 4 queries, analyzed results, and delivered a complete script, which was approved.
